food.definition: Any solid substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.

drink.definition: To consume (a liquid) through the mouth.

hockey.definition: Ice hockey, a game on ice in which two teams of six players skate and try to score by shooting a puck into the opposing team's net, using their sticks.

school.definition: (collective) A group of fish or a group of marine mammals such as porpoises, dolphins, or whales.
